mods.abstract: RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed to jail, on the 30th of January last, a negro-boy, calling himself JACK; said boy is about 6 feet, 3 inches high, of a griff complexion, has a small scar over his left eye, a scar on his breast, an done upper fore-tooth out, says he is the property of Dr. Harris, living near Centreville, on Bayou Teche. The owner of said slave is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away. J.H. Cole, Dep. Sheriff. Lake Charles, Calcasieu, Feb. 11th, 1854.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
